data.summary: PLEASE NOTE: The 2020 SHPE National Convention will be a virtual event. The SHPE National Convention serves as the country’s largest gathering of Hispanic STEM students and professionals, offering a unique opportunity to engage, support, educate and advance the careers of Hispanic students and professionals. We encourage all who are invested in Hispanics in STEM -students, professionals, academics, hiring managers, and recruiters – to join us for an inspirational and transformational five days on October 26 – 31st.
